basic_info.name: Amity University Noida Admission Process
description: Amity University Noida Admission 2024 is open for all UG and PG programmes. Indian and foreign applicants can apply on the official website of the university. The application process is conducted online only and Amity University admissions usually begin in January/ February. The application fee for Amity Noida is INR 1,500 for Indian applicants.

Admission to all courses at Amity University Noida is merit-based. However, for the MBA course, the university accepts entrance exam scores of MAT, CAT, XAT, NMAT, CMAT, and GMAT. Students must appear for a Personal Interview round for the final selection. However, candidates for design courses have to appear for a creative test as well before qualifying for the PI round.

Admission to Amity University is categorised for Sponsored and Non-Sponsored candidates. The non-sponsored candidates are usually high-merit students who fulfil the eligibility criteria and cutoffs. On the other hand, sponsored students have low merit and their eligibility and cutoff criteria are reduced for which they are charged comparatively higher fees.

Ques. What are some of the notable accreditations and recognitions that Amity University holds?
Ans. Amity University holds several notable accreditations, recognitions, and memberships. Firstly, it is accredited with an "A+" Grade by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC), showcasing its commitment to academic excellence. Moreover, it is recognized by statutory bodies such as the University Grants Commission (UGC) and approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), ensuring the quality and legitimacy of its programs.
Furthermore, Amity University Noida stands out as Asia's only not-for-profit university to receive regional accreditation from the United States. This accreditation adds to its global recognition and credibility. Additionally, it holds memberships in prestigious organizations including the Association of Indian Universities (AIU), the Association of Commonwealth Universities (ACU), and the International Association of Universities, further enhancing its international standing.
In terms of certifications, Amity University is certified by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO), ensuring that it maintains high standards in various aspects of its operations. It is also recognized by the United Kingdom's Quality Assurance Agency in Higher Education, highlighting its adherence to quality benchmarks.
Moreover, Amity University's recognition extends to various governmental bodies such as the Ministry of Human Resource Development (HRD), the Department of Scientific and Industrial Research (DISR) under the Ministry of Science and Technology, and the Distance Education Council. Additionally, it holds approvals from regulatory bodies like the Bar Council of India (BCI), the National Council for Teacher Education (NCTE), the Council of Architecture (COA), and the Institution of Engineering and Technology (IET).
Furthermore, its inclusion in the United Nations listing and the Central Counseling Board underscores its relevance and credibility in the educational landscape.

​Ques. What is the admission process for Amity University Noida?
Ans. The admission process for undergraduate and postgraduate programmes at Amity University Noida typically begins in January or February each year and is open to both Indian and foreign applicants. Interested candidates can apply online through the official website of the university. The application process is conducted exclusively online, and there is an application fee of INR 1,500 for Indian applicants.
Admission to all courses at Amity University Noida is primarily merit-based. However, for the Master of Business Administration (MBA) course, the university considers entrance exam scores from MAT, CAT, XAT, NMAT, CMAT, and GMAT. Additionally, design course applicants must undergo a creative test as part of the selection process, in addition to appearing for a Personal Interview (PI) round.
Once candidates have submitted their applications and met the initial eligibility criteria, they may be shortlisted for further evaluation, which may include a PI round. This interview round serves as a final assessment of the candidate's suitability for admission to the respective programme.
In summary, the admission process at Amity University Noida involves online application submission, merit-based selection for most courses, and additional entrance exam scores and/or creative tests for specific programmes such as MBA and design courses. The final selection is based on a combination of academic merit and performance in the interview round.
Ques. How does Amity University differentiate between Sponsored and Non-Sponsored candidates during the admission process?
Ans. Amity University employs a categorization system for admission, distinguishing between Sponsored and Non-Sponsored candidates. Non-sponsored candidates typically consist of high-merit students who meet or exceed the eligibility criteria and cutoffs set by the university. These candidates are selected based on their academic achievements and performance in entrance exams or other relevant assessments.
In contrast, Sponsored candidates are those who may not meet the same academic standards as Non-Sponsored candidates. As a result, their eligibility criteria and cutoffs are often relaxed to accommodate their lower merit levels. However, Sponsored candidates are required to pay comparatively higher fees for their education at Amity University.
The distinction between Sponsored and Non-Sponsored candidates allows the university to balance its commitment to academic excellence with its aim of providing educational opportunities to a broader range of students.
Ques. What are the steps involved in the application process for admission to Amity University Noida?
Ans. The application process for admission to Amity University Noida begins with visiting the official website and clicking on the "Apply Now 2024" link. Upon clicking, a new window opens where applicants fill in essential details such as their name, email, mobile number, and captcha. Following this, applicants must pay the application fee of INR 1,500 and submit the form.
Once the form is submitted, applicants receive a form number and password which they can use to log in to the Amity University admission microsite. All updates regarding the admission process, including interview schedules and result announcements, are communicated exclusively through this microsite. If selected for admission, applicants will find a soft copy of the admission letter uploaded to the microsite.
Additionally, during the application process, applicants must upload scanned copies of their Class X mark sheet and a recent coloured passport-size photograph.
Ques. What is Amity University's Noida MBA cutoff?
Ans. The MBA cutoff scores for admission to Amity University Noida in 2024 have been released based on merit in various national-level management exams. For the Non-Sponsored category, the cutoff scores are as follows: MAT - 650, GMAT - 550, CMAT - 200, CAT - 85 percentile, XAT - 85 percentile, and NMAT - 250. In contrast, for the Sponsored category, the cutoff scores are slightly lower across all exams, with MAT at 600, GMAT at 500, CMAT at 150, CAT at 75 percentile, XAT at 75 percentile, and NMAT at 200. These cutoff scores indicate the minimum scores or percentiles required by candidates in each exam category to qualify for admission to the MBA program at Amity University Noida, with variations between the Non-Sponsored and Sponsored categories reflecting differences in eligibility criteria and admission standards.
Ques. How are the placements at Amity University Noida?
Ans. The placement scenario at Amity University Noida in 2023 showcased several impressive highlights. The highest package offered to a B.Tech student reached an impressive INR 61.75 LPA at the Amity School of Engineering & Technology. Furthermore, the university witnessed a substantial influx of companies visiting its campus, with a total of 1,050 companies participating in the recruitment drive. Over 11,000 job offers were extended to students across various courses. Accenture emerged as the top recruiter with 3,582 job offers, followed closely by Wipro with 3,268 offers.
Ques. What are the facilities available at the Amity University Noida campus?
Ans. Amity University Noida boasts a range of modern facilities designed to enhance the student experience. The campus features spacious and air-conditioned 430 classrooms, many of which are built in an amphitheatre style and equipped with state-of-the-art audio-visual equipment for effective lectures and presentations.
Additionally, the university provides 50 syndicate rooms accommodating up to 300 students, offering ideal spaces for brainstorming sessions, society meetings, and group discussions. The campus houses a large auditorium with a seating capacity exceeding 3500, serving as a venue for conferences, events, and guest lectures.
The central library is stocked with over 2 lakh books and provides access to 17,000 online journals, along with online learning platforms like UGC-Infonet and DELNET. Amity University Noida also prioritizes sports facilities, participating annually in a month-long mega event called Sangathan and boasting a 15-acre sports complex for various activities.
Moreover, the campus provides comfortable accommodation facilities, with separate hostel facilities for boys and girls featuring AC residential compartments, sitting lounges, and other amenities, contributing to a conducive living and learning environment for students.
Ques. What additional amenities and services are available at Amity University Noida beyond academic and recreational facilities?
Ans. In addition to the extensive academic and recreational facilities, Amity University Noida provides a range of amenities and services to cater to the diverse needs of its students and staff. The campus features an array of on-campus cafeterias and food courts, including popular chains like Cafe Coffee Day, Dosa Plaza, Subway, Domino's, Bikano, Mamma Mia, and Mrs. Kaur Cookies, ensuring convenient access to a variety of dining options.
Moreover, the university hosts departmental stores, a Tekson Bookshop, stationery shops, a Salon, and laundry facilities, offering essential services and resources within easy reach. Additionally, Amity University Noida prioritizes student well-being by providing medical support services and ample parking facilities, further enhancing the overall convenience and comfort of campus life.
Ques. What are some of the cultural events hosted by Amity University?
Ans. Students at Amity University Noida enjoy significant exposure to cultural diversity, with over 3000 students from 45 countries pursuing higher studies at the institution. This diverse environment provides students with valuable opportunities to interact with peers from different backgrounds, fostering cross-cultural understanding and collaboration.
Additionally, Amity University Noida hosts several renowned cultural events and festivals, including Amiphoria, Amity Youth Fest, Utsav, Sangathan, Amimun, and Literature Festival. These events offer platforms for students to showcase their talents, exchange cultural experiences, and celebrate diversity. Overall, the combination of cultural diversity and vibrant cultural events enriches the student experience at Amity University Noida, contributing to a dynamic and inclusive learning environment.

Ans. Amity University Noida has been graced by several Bollywood celebrities who have visited the campus for various events and interactions, adding to the vibrancy of campus life. Notable personalities include Salman Khan and Sonam Kapoor, who visited for a movie promotion event. Renowned playback singer Sonu Nigam enthralled students with his performance during INBUSH, a university event. These visits not only offer students unique entertainment opportunities but also inspire and motivate them through interactions with industry icons, contributing to the dynamic and culturally rich atmosphere of Amity University Noida.
Ques. What are some of the clubs and committees available for students at Amity University Noida?
Ans. Amity University Noida offers a diverse range of clubs and committees where students can explore their interests, hone their skills, and engage in various activities. With 25 clubs covering a wide spectrum of interests such as academics, dance, sports, seminars, poetry, gaming, programming, etc students have ample opportunities to showcase their talents and pursue their passions.

These clubs and committees play a crucial role in fostering a vibrant campus community and encouraging collaboration, creativity, and personal development among the student body at Amity University Noida.

Ques. What are the median salary packages offered for various courses at Amity University Noida?
Ans. According to the NIRF Report 2023, Amity University Noida provides insights into the median salary packages offered across a range of courses. For undergraduate programs such as B.Com, B.Sc, BBA, BCA, etc. (3 years), the median salary stands at INR 4.5 LPA. For postgraduate programs, including M.Sc, MBA, M.Des, M.Tech, MA, etc. (2 years), the median salary is INR 5.5 LPA. Additionally, integrated programs like BBA-MBA, B.Tech-M.Tech, and BA-MA Clinical Psychology offer a median salary of INR 5 LPA.

Ques. How does Amity University Noida facilitate international collaborations?
Ans. Amity University Noida fosters global engagement and collaboration through its extensive network of partnerships with over 100 international universities, laboratories, and research centres. These partnerships facilitate various opportunities such as student exchange programs, faculty exchange initiatives, educational tours, joint research endeavours, and curriculum development projects.
Some prominent institutions in Amity University's partnership network include Kent State University, Purdue University, University of Texas, Carleton University, Newcastle University, University of Salford, Government of South Australia, VU University Amsterdam, University of Birmingham, etc. These collaborations enrich the academic experience at Amity University Noida by providing students and faculty with exposure to diverse perspectives, resources, and learning environments on a global scale.
Ques. What are the various scholarships offered by Amity University Noida?
Ans. Amity University Noida provides a range of scholarships to students based on their academic merit and achievements. The Scholarship-Cum-Fast Track Admission offers direct admission without the need to appear in the Admission Selection Process, along with an academic fee scholarship for the first year, determined by the candidate's merit in Class 12.
For B.Tech programs, scholarships are awarded based on the JEE Main Percentile, while for PG programs, scholarships are determined by the candidate's merit in both Class 12 and their Graduation Degree.
Additionally, the university offers Sports Scholarships to National and International Players. The continuation of scholarships is subject to annual evaluation, with further years of eligibility based on the student's merit in the last qualifying examination. These scholarship opportunities aim to support and recognize academic excellence and achievements among students at Amity University Noida.

faqs.question: ​What is the admission process for Amity University Noida?
faqs.answer: Ans.The admission process for undergraduate and postgraduate programmes at Amity University Noida typically begins in January or February each year and is open to both Indian and foreign applicants. Interested candidates can apply online through the official website of the university. The application process is conducted exclusively online, and there is an application fee of INR 1,500 for Indian applicants.Admission to all courses at Amity University Noida is primarily merit-based. However, for the Master of Business Administration (MBA) course, the university considers entrance exam scores from MAT, CAT, XAT, NMAT, CMAT, and GMAT. Additionally, design course applicants must undergo a creative test as part of the selection process, in addition to appearing for a Personal Interview (PI) round.Once candidates have submitted their applications and met the initial eligibility criteria, they may be shortlisted for further evaluation, which may include a PI round. This interview round serves as a final assessment of the candidate's suitability for admission to the respective programme.In summary, the admission process at Amity University Noida involves online application submission, merit-based selection for most courses, and additional entrance exam scores and/or creative tests for specific programmes such as MBA and design courses. The final selection is based on a combination of academic merit and performance in the interview round.

faqs.question: How does Amity University differentiate between Sponsored and Non-Sponsored candidates during the admission process?
faqs.answer: Ans.Amity University employs a categorization system for admission, distinguishing between Sponsored and Non-Sponsored candidates. Non-sponsored candidates typically consist of high-merit students who meet or exceed the eligibility criteria and cutoffs set by the university. These candidates are selected based on their academic achievements and performance in entrance exams or other relevant assessments.In contrast, Sponsored candidates are those who may not meet the same academic standards as Non-Sponsored candidates. As a result, their eligibility criteria and cutoffs are often relaxed to accommodate their lower merit levels. However, Sponsored candidates are required to pay comparatively higher fees for their education at Amity University.The distinction between Sponsored and Non-Sponsored candidates allows the university to balance its commitment to academic excellence with its aim of providing educational opportunities to a broader range of students.

faqs.question: What are the steps involved in the application process for admission to Amity University Noida?
